Name: AI/ML Governance Kickoff
Exit_Criteria: Kickoff complete; KNOT ownership assigned; initial timeline agreed

Name: Certification Pre-Application Meeting
Entry_Criteria: Certification strategy draft complete; authority contact established
Exit_Criteria: Pre-application meeting held; feedback documented; CRI topics identified

Name: Learning Assurance Objectives Baseline
Entry_Criteria: EASA W-shape process reviewed; DAL allocations confirmed
Exit_Criteria: LA objectives documented; stakeholder review complete

Name: Data Governance Framework Review
Entry_Criteria: Data quality requirements drafted; provenance approach defined
Exit_Criteria: Framework reviewed by STK_CERT and STK_SAF; gaps identified

Name: V&V Methodology Preliminary Design Review
Entry_Criteria: Coverage criteria drafted; robustness approach defined
Exit_Criteria: PDR complete; methodology approved for development

Name: Certification Issue Paper Submission
Entry_Criteria: MoC analysis complete; novel aspects documented
Exit_Criteria: IP submitted to authority; acknowledgment received

Name: Runtime Monitoring Architecture Review
Entry_Criteria: Monitor requirements baselined; OOD methods selected

Name: Explainability Approach Approval
Exit_Criteria: Approach approved by STK_CERT; implementation guidance issued

Name: Human-AI Interaction Concept Review
Entry_Criteria: Teaming requirements defined; trust mechanisms proposed
Exit_Criteria: Concept approved by STK_HF and STK_SAF

Name: Tool Qualification Strategy Approval
Entry_Criteria: Framework analysis complete; qualification gaps identified

Name: Certification Strategy Approval
Entry_Criteria: All MoC finalized; authority feedback incorporated
Exit_Criteria: Strategy approved by STK_CERT; baseline frozen

Name: ATA 95-00 Node Closure
Entry_Criteria: All KNOTs closed; residuals at target; TT distributed
Exit_Criteria: Node closure approved; downstream 95-10 to 95-70 unblocked
